text: Tini balalena -- ''he amara sampradaya! Tomara ki bhebe dekhecha -- ami yadi amara prabhu theke pa'oya spasta-pramanera upare pratisthita thaki ebam tini yadi tamra kacha theke amake anugraha dana kare thakena tabe ke amake sahayya karabe allah‌ra kabala theke yadi ami tamra abadhyata kari? Sutaram tomara to ksati sadhana kara chara amara ara kichu'i barabe na.’’
